title: PLOS Variability in Regularity: Mining Temporal Mobility Patterns in London, Singapore and Beijing Using Smart-Card Data | PLOS One
summary: This post discusses discovering regularities in human mobility at aggregated spatio-temporal scales using smart-card data.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because it directly addresses 'spatio-temporal scales' and uses 'data', which is relevant to the search query. While it doesn't explicitly mention point processes or survey data, the spatio-temporal aspect is present.
